mapper.update: update t_membertype set mem_Type_Name = #{memTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_Type_Discount = #{memTypeDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mem_Type_Desc = #{memTypeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mem_Type_ID = #{memTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mem_Type_ID, mem_Type_Name, mem_Type_Discount, mem_Type_Desc, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_membertype where mem_Type_ID = #{memTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mem_Type_ID, mem_Type_Name, mem_Type_Discount, mem_Type_Desc, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_membertype
